mapper.select: SELECT * FROM testpaper WHERE organization_id = #{organizationId} AND testpaper_type = 1

SELECT t.testpaper_id,t.testpaper_title,t.author_id,t.create_time,t.ending_time,t.chapter_id,c.chapter_name,t.testpaper_score,t.testpaper_type,t.organization_id FROM testpaper t, chapter c WHERE t.organization_id = #{organizationId} AND t.testpaper_type = 0 AND c.chapter_id = t.chapter_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO testpaper(testpaper_title, author_id, create_time, ending_time, testpaper_type, organization_id) VALUES (#{testpaper.testpaperTitle}, #{testpaper.authorId}, #{testpaper.createTime}, #{testpaper.endingTime}, #{testpaper.testpaperType}, #{testpaper.organizationId})
mapper.update: UPDATE testpaper SET testpaper_score = #{score} WHERE testpaper_id = #{testpaperId}
